t: Amazon Publishing - Wikipedia
s: April 3, 2025 - Powered by Amazon is a self-publishing platform that allows the publication of a series of books under any imprint name. For example, in May 2011, Seth Godin launched The Domino Project, an imprint created to publish a series of manifestos. It was the inaugural Powered by Amazon imprint project.

t: Get to know the Belem Declaration signed by the Amazon countries at the Summit - OTCA
s: November 14, 2023 - The eight countries that make up the Amazon Cooperation Treaty Organization (ACTO) sign the Belém Declaration during the Amazon Summit, this Tuesday (8). The document consolidates the consensus agenda of Brazil, Bolivia, Colombia, Ecuador, Guyana, Peru, Suriname and Venezuela for the region.
